text: [Music]
amazon ebs snapshots provide a simple
and secure solution for protecting your
block storage data
increasing regulatory and compliance
demands are driving you to retain
snapshots for longer periods of time
increasing the cost of your storage what
if there was a way to save on cost while
keeping archive data protected for years
introducing ebs snapshots archive a
lower cost storage for full point in
time copies that require retention for
months or years and do not need frequent
or fast retrievals
the ebs snapshots archive lowers your
snapshot storage costs when compared to
long-term retention in the ebs snapshot
tier note that your archive snapshots
need a 90-day minimum storage and there
is a charge for retrieval
effortlessly archive snapshots with a
single api call eliminating the need for
custom scripts and third-party tools
eps snapshots archive are ideal for your
monthly and yearly backups as well as
end-of-project snapshots which need to
be kept for compliance
get started now
